documents.document: @FoxNews @KellyannePolls We hate alternative facts. Especially when they are used in a populist fashion.
@thehill is this the argument for everything these days? If they put alternative facts out there and get caught - 'we won the election'?
@BreitbartNews just riding the wave that Obama created.
@politico @politicoalex anyone who watches her hearing can see that she is totally unprepared and has no clue. Totally incompetent
@thehill Confirm the inconfirmable? How incompetent would one need to be so that the Senat does not confirm? Listen to the hearing...
@thehill ... and America is watching.
@ABC I am glad to know that Donald has the codes
@FoxNews @DWStweets @POTUS @FoxNewsInsider and highly incompetent heads of dept are still getting through e.g. DeVos
@washingtonpost public education funded through local taxes is a dead end bc it cements econ disadvantages. Federal funding would work
@michellemalkin @TheGibsterr I am not sure how smart she is... but very dogmatic for sure.
@thehill it is not regrettable. It shows a lack of communication, involvement and competence. It is what a prince would have done 200 yr ago
@washingtonpost incompetence at the highest level...
@thehill Yates did exactly what she 'campaigned' on. Respect! A person with integrity - it is unfortunate that the US gov loses so many now
@WashTimes that comment does not bode well for Donald. Have not seen more of a hack in the WH
@realDonaldTrump Washington did not work bc the GOP blocked everything and it does not work for princes that sign amateurish exec orders
@FoxNews @JaySekulow by all accounts Donald is out of line. His amateurish implementation of an exec order caused all the chaos
@FoxNews @newtgingrich more like a rejection of the person Donald Trump and his advisor Bannon. And that is more than justified.
@CBSNews how can she defend the indefensible? Amateur hour in the White House.
@BreitbartNews a decent man is frustrated and moved to tears by an amateur WH. Not even Rep support the incompetent way this was implemented
@FoxNews @POTUS @PressSec wow ... I want to see what we experience when the government operates not at 'phenomenal' performance levels
@FoxNews @PressSec it is a privilege - true. But the amateurish way how Trump and his crew operates is ridiculous
@FoxNews @oreillyfactor if the amateurs at the helm were more thoughtful upfront, these mistakes would have not been made in the first place
@FoxNews @KatiePavlich @BarackObama and we would have never been there if it was not for Bush - let's not forget who got us into this mess
@GMA @GStephanopoulos @KellyannePolls what is different here is the chaos that you created by shooting from the hip. Bad planning
@GMA @KellyannePolls ... and Donald did not plan like a business man. This was haphazardly done
@GMA @KellyannePolls if you want people to understand, you should spend time communicating rather than have the prince write orders.
@GMA @KellyannePolls the extraordinary accomplishments are that D mobilized in 8 days an opposition that no pres except Nixon has ever seen
@realDonaldTrump if you did not screw up so badly in the first 8 days, you would not face so much opposition.
@BBCWorld @BBCNews speaks as much about the family as about the US Health Care System (that is about to get worse)
@FoxNews Sen. Schumer is a decent man something that cannot be said about Donald
@FoxNews the White House is Trump, so he backs himself?
@FoxNews @ScottBaio @MariaBartiromo They get that way when intolerant people cut down the rights of others.
@NewYorker @realDonaldTrump Donald should read some of the social science stuff that came out of the Cuban missile crisis. Nothing learned?
@thehill maybe Dory can show him the way?
@FoxNews @ScottBaio I don't think it is 'they' who lost, but all of us.
@ashleyfeinberg @thehill @realDonaldTrump ... and this guy sits in the national security council? Good luck America and the world!
@BostonGlobe maybe because Bannon makes Trump's decisions?
@IvankaTrump probably forgot that there is a mirror.
@thehill @Reince @realDonaldTrump How about citizens traveling to those countries? Question them and whoever had a phone call/ sent a letter
@BostonGlobe he is 'trying' to help make the US safer, yes like an amateur. But his shooting from the hip accomplishes the opposite.
@FoxNewsSunday @FoxNews @KellyannePolls It is the US consumer who will have to pay & finance the wall. Israels 140 mile fence cost 420MM.
@michellemalkin @Twitter Muslim BH is from Egypt, a country that is not banned. Maybe because your great leader has business ties there?
@politico @KellyannePolls ... and for American greatness. Right?
@thehill Donald said a lot of crazy stuff eg grab them by ... you know. Is he going to do that? Does not make it desirable, moral, legal.
@washingtonpost it appears to me that these two just don't need to start it
@michellemalkin @NYTWA Saudi Arabia where Osama Bin Laden is from not incl, but Donald has biz there. Badly thought out exec orders.
@FoxNews @KellyannePolls @realDonaldTrump I call that threats not promises
@thehill but this is who he is and who the electoral college elected ... unfortunately. And now America is great again, right?
@thehill just another sign that Donald feels that he is above it all: the truth, basic decency, the law, morality. You name it
@reaIDonaldTrunp TruNp? Fake twitter account! Look - we don't need you faking it. Donald does it on his own.
@KellyannePolls @foxandfriends if the 'news' are repeating self-delusions of Donald and crew, then that will never happen
@FoxNews @SheriffClarke Great to have the 1 percenters run the government then
@FoxNews @POTUS Osama Bin Laden was a Saudi - Saudis are not banned (neither should they). Donald's biz ties the reason for selectivity?
@thehill Now that is a serious issue that we have to debate. There is nothing else of importance, right?
@washingtonpost ... let's not forget that the Reps are the cause of any collapse in Obamacare if we see it (elim of indiv mandate, rhetoric)
@BreitbartNews to answer your question: the electorate but not the majority of voters (and yes I know the latter don't matter in a republic)
@FoxNews @seanhannity in your case, we all agree
@FoxNews @seanhannity GOP is probably very concerned about Donald's relationship to truth, reality, foreign governments - or should be.
@MikeyManker @FoxNews @seanhannity The red areas equal the white space - not a lot there (population, GDP, etc)
Man Kicked Airport Worker Wearing Hijab and referring to Trump, , via @nytimes Trump should keep track of that too https://t.co/i0d9RUnuqX
@thehill @SenSchumer I hope that you can keep incompetence i.e. Betsy out of the ed department
@sallen201757 @thehill true, but the it came with a lot of baggage.
@thehill reminds a little of Berlin...
@thehill @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for us even more so - we have to rely on you to keep your cool. There is little evidence that you can
@0Hour1Army @PiculiarByPayal @dallasschools It would be good to have some gun control, don't you think?
@thehill @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @KellyannePolls ... and a really famous person told me that the earth is flat. Let's put it out there
@BostonGlobe @realDonaldTrump science = politics now? Way to go great America
@washingtonpost @KellyannePolls Wow, Trump did it. And so early in his presidency! He obviously created a lot of jobs already.
@washingtonpost but Donald said so. Is that not evidence enough for you?
@thehill and tomorrow, if Donald believes that the earth is flat, are you going to push that belief?
@scritchley @Lawrence @PressSec and why don't you? It was apparent to anyone that you were asked to lie.
@FoxNews @seanspicer it seems that you don't get it right: Inauguration crowds, 3-5 mm illegal voters etc.
@FoxNews @seanspicer are you really that delusional? I don't think so. Keep it real.
@thehill hang Donald's picture next to it
@FoxNews @tedcruz Go ahead. It just demonstrates that you do not care about people with pre-existing conditions.
@FoxNews @realDonaldTrump @newtgingrich 'every executive'? Not true. Plenty are worried about having Finakd in charge
@FoxNews @SenTedCruz All Star? Certain individuals maybe. But there are plenty of obviously wrong nominations. Just look at the hearings
@FoxNews @newtgingrich @POTUS @HillaryClinton @FoxNewsInsider I am not sure about Donald being 'anti-stupidity'...
@washingtonpost @realDonaldTrump perfectly understandable reaction given the context.
@realDonaldTrump ... and have Mexico pay for it. Sure ....
@realDonaldTrump Oh really. And what would they do?
@CBSNews @seanspicer ... maybe 'according to the law...' but according to common sense of course he can have lots of conflict of interest.
@politico @seanspicer @realDonaldTrump as WH ethics advisor says: common sense dictates that he can have conflict of interests - and he does
@washingtonpost Her hearing does not make us desperate to find anything to not confirm her; plenty material there. How can she be confirmed?
@washingtonpost Says Donald: 'the earth is flat, I will make it round... look what I have accomplished - it is round!' Alternative facts
@thehill @realDonaldTrump Child, take 5 deep breaths and move on. I hope you have more important things on your mind
@ABC only the Trump Administration needs to make such a statement 3 days after taking office. Already lost all credibility over nothing.
@washingtonpost ... like there were 1-1.5mm people at his inauguration. Another 'alt' fact. Ridiculous.
@FoxNews @oreillyfactor @POTUS ... but if he has not won (inaug #), it would fit him better to be humble (which a narcissist cannot be)
@FoxNews @oreillyfactor @FoxNewsInsider ... and the effort is led by Donald himself. 1,5mm. Why boast & lie about some rung so trivial?
@nikkmon @BreitbartNews ... and more importantly, Breitbart should not mention voters as an argument for 'the mandate'
@nikkmon @BreitbartNews ... populism, however, a lot
@KellyannePolls @MeetThePress Watched entire clip and you evaded answers as always. We will see what Donald will actually do. Seen no plan
@thehill ... nor others. Even assuming that you mean well, the incompetence demonstrated in the conf hearing does not offer confidence
@washingtonpost @BernieSanders Donald creates the 'death spiral' by abandoning the indiv mandate. Reps will then say that they predicted it
@FoxNews I am certain that no one asked any of the protesters whether they are pro choice or pro life. Anyone could have just walked
@MeetThePress @KellyannePolls Why did the lie about such an insignificant piece of info? Because they are so insecure...
@jayjanet66 @MeetThePress @chucktodd @KellyannePolls what else is there left, but to laugh at 'alt' facts? It is so ridiculous.
@MeetThePress @KellyannePolls Kelly, your President's boasts are asking for the reporting. Focus on stuff that matters & tell us your plans
@CBSNews at least after the election, there are no more excuses. Donald is above public opinion, ethics and the law
